members.name: getDocumentTypeDeclaration
members.comment: Returns the entire Document Type Declaration as a string, including the internal DTD subset. This may be null if there is not an internal subset. If it is not null it must return the entire Document Type Declaration which matches the doctypedecl production in the XML 1.0 specification

members.name: getProcessedDTD
members.comment: Returns an implementation defined representation of the DTD. This method may return null if no representation is available.

members.name: getNotations
members.comment: Return a List containing the notations declared in the DTD. This list must contain NotationDeclaration events.

return: an unordered list of NotationDeclaration events

members.name: getEntities
members.comment: Return a List containing the general entities, both external and internal, declared in the DTD. This list must contain EntityDeclaration events.

return: an unordered list of EntityDeclaration events

name: javax.xml.stream.events.DTD
comment: This is the top level interface for events dealing with DTDs
